dublin_core.dcvalue: The rapid expansion and development of mobile technology have advanced an area called mobile health mHealth which is expected to improve healthcare delivery and increase the efficacy of healthcare services This paper provides an overview of mHealthuse in the developing world with a specific focus on the Middle East Different search engines and databases were used to search for Mobile Health mHealth literature on the developing world and the Middle East in September 2012 The results show that there is a growing demand within the developing world and the Middle East for the use of mobile technologies that focus on information gathering and sharing accessibility and reach and public health The future of mHealth in the developing world and the Middle East is also discussed
Studies in health technology and informatics
The state of mobile health in the developing world and the Middle East.
